articles.title: Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
articles.content:
Press Conference Held at Russian Embassy
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A press conference took place at the Russian Embassy here Thursday, on the day of diplomats of Russia.
					 Attending it were media persons, the TASS correspondent here, and staff members of the Russian Embassy.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, made a speech.
					
					 He told the whole story of Diplomat's Day of Russia, and referred to the fact that the Russian diplomats are active in many countries with high patriotism.
					
					 He gave answers to the questions put by the journalists.
					
					 The participants looked round the photos showing the activities of Russian diplomats and watched a Russian documentary.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in China
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in China
Beijing, February 8 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Feb. 7 on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day.
					 Present there on invitation were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Kong Xuanyou, assistant to the foreign minister, Wang Yajun, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party, Ci Guowei, deputy director of the Office of International Military Cooperation of the Central Military Commission, and Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and other officials concerned of China.
					
					 DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and his embassy officials were on hand.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Spring Concert Given
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Spring Concert Given
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- There took place a DPRK-China friendship spring concert for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) and marking the 10th anniversary of his visit to the Chinese embassy here on the occasion of the January 15th of the lunar month at the embassy on Thursday.
					 It was co-sponsored by the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, the Ministry of Culture of China and the Chinese embassy.
					
					 Among the audience were DPRK Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk who doubles as chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association, officials concerned, Chinese Ambassador Li Jinjun and staff members of the Chinese embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made before the concert.
					
					 Members of the delegation of culture and arts of Dandong City, China staged diverse numbers such as immortal classic "Where Are You, Dear General?", female solo "Attraction" and female solo and dance "Beautiful China".
					
					 The performers represented boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and the patriotic will and national emotion of the Chinese people.
					
					 The concert was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The ambassador gave a reception.

articles.title: Congratulations to Ghanaian FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Ghanaian FM
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Shirley Ayorkor Botchway upon her appointment as foreign minister of Ghana.
					 The message wished her success in her new job, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by the concerted efforts.

articles.title: AP Vice-President Here
articles.content:
AP Vice-President Here
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Phillips Ian Antony, vice-president of the Associated Press, and his party arrived here Thursday.

articles.title: Abrogation of SOFA Urged
articles.content:
Abrogation of SOFA Urged
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Side Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind the GIs' Crimes issued a statement Thursday, 50 years since south Korea-U.S. "Status of Forces Agreement" (SOFA) was effectuated after it was signed by traitor Park Chung-hee, a hideous "yusin" dictator, with the U.S.
					 The Park military fascist clique committed such hideous pro-U.S. deed of officially putting into effect the SOFA on Feb. 9, 1967, which it signed with the U.S. in July 1966 despite unanimous rejection and denunciation by the south Koreans, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The SOFA is an unprecedented traitorous agreement and a modern-day slave document of brigandish nature.
					
					 The effectuation of this shackling agreement granted the U.S. imperialist aggression forces unlimited privileges in south Korea to make them lord it over it as an extraterritorial de factor ruler, thereby bringing intolerable misfortune, pain, disaster and shame to the people.
					
					 However, the group of traitors offer stupendous amount of fund, collected as taxes, to the U.S., begging for its permanent military in south Korea and work hard to deploy THAAD for aggression within this year.
					
					 What is more infuriating is that the U.S. is these days pressing the south Korean puppet forces to sign a "multi-party agreement on status of stationary troops" with nine countries under the "UN Forces Command".
					
					 The "multi-party agreement on status of stationary troops", a revised version of the SOFA, will make south Koreans suffer bitterer pain under the blood-stained military boots of multi-national forces, to say nothing of GIs, and it is as clear as noonday that south Korea will turn into a den of world-level crimes and plunder.
					
					 The U.S., root cause of all misfortune and pain of the south Koreans, is the chief culprit of aggression and crime and sworn enemy of the Korean nation as it tries to turn south Korea into the world's biggest arsenal for a nuclear war and a theatre of international crimes, swayed over not only by the GIs but also by multi-national forces.
					
					 The south Koreans' misfortune and pain will grow bitterer as long as the U.S. domination and military presence continue and the group of pro-American traitors is allowed to go scot-free, depending on outsiders with no heed paid to the nation's dignity, interests, existence and security.
					
					 The people from all walks of life in south Korea should courageously turn out in the action to immediately scrap SOFA and all other shackling agreements and treaties, drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces from south Korea and throw overboard the group of pro-U.S. traitors.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition "The Whole Life for Country and People" was opened with due ceremony at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday to celebrate the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display there is a photo of Kim Jong Il with a broad smile on his face who blesses Juche Korea bright future.
					
					 Also displayed are photos documenting the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il who made undying contribution to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the human cause of independence.
					
					 Among photos are those showing revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il who made great contribution to the work for independent reunification of Korea and global independence.
					
					 Some of the photos show the trait of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as a great man who is upholding with loyalty the revolutionary cause of Juche while taking the road for Songun revolutionary leadership from long ago together with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There are also photos showing the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK determined to accelerate the final victory of a socialist power.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and working people in the city.

articles.title: Week of Film Show Opens
articles.content:
Week of Film Show Opens
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A week of film show was opened on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Such documentary films as "Shining Star of Paektu" and "Shine, Jong Il Peak" dealing with his revolutionary career will be shown at cinemas and halls of culture in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 Such feature films as "Lifeline", "A White Gem", "Graduation Diploma", "Trace of Military Service", "Story about My House" and "Small House on Forefront" will also be shown.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants enjoyed "Benefactor of Eternal Lives," Part 24 of the Korean documentary film "Care Shown to Make Their Lives Shine".
					
					 A week of film show was opened in every province on the same day.

articles.title: 7th National Cooking Competition Held
articles.content:
7th National Cooking Competition Held
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The 7th National Cooking Competition took place at the Pyongyang Noodle House from February 7 to 9 with the approach of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The competition was divided into the panels of the public service, external service and service of ministries and national institutions, public catering establishments in Pyongyang and every province (municipality). It brought together more than 300 cooks and waitresses of 60 units.
					
					 It took place in such ways that each unit displayed its dishes and drinks which were made in the defined time and presented to the examination.
					
					 Its participants fully displayed their cooking techniques trained in the service activities.

articles.title: Light Industrial Factories Revitalized in North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Light Industrial Factories Revitalized in North Hamgyong Province
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said in his New Year Address that light industry should work out proper management strategies so as to revitalize production and bring about a turn in diversifying the range and types of consumer goods and improving their quality.
					 In hearty response to his call, North Hamgyong Province in the DPRK is directing big efforts to revitalizing light industrial factories.
					
					 The Provincial People's Committee modernized the Orang Paper Factory as a model and, on this basis, encourages production at other factories in counties and cities.
					
					 The modernization for increased production draws to a close at the Kyongsong Ceramic Factory.
					
					 The Musan Foodstuff Factory has introduced technical innovations to upgrade and diversify its products.
					
					 In particular, the Susongchon General Foodstuff Factory put the candy production process on an automated and streamlined basis by its own efforts.
					
					 Successes have also been witnessed at the Chongjin Footwear Factory, Chongjin Bag Factory, Hoeryong Shoes Factory and other factories.
					
					 Meanwhile, due measures have been taken to modernize local industrial factories and supply raw materials to them on a regular basis.

articles.title: Wooden Bridge Remains of Koguryo Kingdom
articles.content:
Wooden Bridge Remains of Koguryo Kingdom
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- There are remains of a wooden bridge, dating back to Koguryo Kingdom (B.C. 277-A.D. 668), in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK. The bridge, built across the River Taedong, was one of the world's biggest bridges early in the 5th century.
					 It was nearly 375 meters long and about 9 meters wide.
					
					 According to a reconstruction picture of the bridge, both of its entrances took a shape of fan tightly covered with boards. Beams were laid lengthways and breadthways on the framework of the bridge and paved with trim planks upon which parapets were fixed planks for safety. 
					
					 And all the joints of the framework were rebated without using hardware like clamp.
					
					 There was a campfire site at the entrance of the bridge to light way.
					
					 The bridge shows well the high wooden architecture of Koguryo people.

articles.title: Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, Native Place of Songun Arms
articles.content:
Phyongchon Revolutionary Site, Native Place of Songun Arms
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Phyongchon Revolutionary Site in Pyongyang is regarded as the native place of the Songun (military-first) arms in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The site is associated with the leadership exploits the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu performed in building the self-reliant defence industry of the country.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung put forward the building of a powerful regular army as a prerequisite to the construction of an independent and sovereign state. He personally walked round the Phyongchon plain in October Juche 34 (1945) to choose a site for the first munitions factory.
					
					 When workers of the factory produced submachine gun by their own efforts, he visited the factory on December 12, 1948 to test-fire it.
					
					 On June 16, 1949, he visited the factory again together with anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk and young Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In December 2015, respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un visited the remodeled Phyongchon Revolutionary Site and said that the historic gun report made by the President at the site turned the DPRK into a powerful nuclear weapons state ready to detonate self-reliant A-bomb and H-bomb to reliably defend its sovereignty and the dignity of the nation, adding that the site is just a native place of the Songun arms.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Opt for Improving North-South Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Opt for Improving North-South Relations
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- It is the consistent stand of the DPRK that all Koreans should pool their efforts to mend the north-south relations and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, reunification programmes common to the nation, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 Improving the inter-Korean relations is a national historic task which brooks no further delay, it says, adding:
					
					 Whoever is concerned for the nation's destiny in the least should not remain a passive onlooker to the present north-south relations exposed to the danger of a nuclear war against the north. 
					
					 The improved north-south relations will help defuse the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are now further escalating the tension by persistently kicking up the anti-DPRK confrontation racket in collusion with outside forces, far from responding to the compatriots' goodwill and magnanimous offer for improved north-south relations.
					
					 If they groundlessly distrust and persist in confrontation with the compatriots who want the reconciliation and unity, the north-south relations can never be repaired.
					
					 They should ponder over the meaning of the DPRK's call and think twice over the consequences to be entailed by their acts of going against it.
					
					 If they opt for the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south and their improved relations by making a switchover in their anachronistic confrontation policy, an epochal phase of peace and reunification will be opened.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should come to their senses, though belatedly, and do something helpful to improving the north-south relations now in the catastrophic phase and achieving peace and reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Discrimination against Korean Schools
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Discrimination against Korean Schools
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- Days ago, the Osaka District Court of Japan rejected a righteous lawsuit of the Korean school in Osaka, in support of the unjust decision of the Osaka Prefecture and City authorities to suspend educational subsidies to the school only among foreign schools.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a vivid expression of national chauvinism peculiar to Japan and a part of its persistent hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It is also an illegal fascist action of trampling down the right of Koreans in Japan to national education and a mean and puerile behavior of the ruffians who are steeped in inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) to the marrow of their bones.
					
					 It is the cunning intention of the Japanese reactionaries to force Koreans in Japan to shoulder the heavy financial burden and suffer psychological stress and finally tear them from the fold of the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					 The Japanese authorities have the legal and moral obligation to respect the right of the Koreans in Japan to national education and guarantee it in the light of the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and from the viewpoint of education.
					
					 The commentary urges the Japanese authorities to deal prudently and fairly with the issue of subsidies to Korean schools in Japan.

articles.title: S. Korea Has No Face to Talk about "Human Rights": KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korea Has No Face to Talk about "Human Rights": KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are using the "human rights issue" as a playing card for its confrontation with the DPRK from the outset of the new year.
					 After beginning "investigation into human rights performance" while citing "severity of human rights situation in the north", the puppet forces held a confab for discussing the orientation for "improving human rights in the north" and formed a plot-breeding organization called "advisory committee for promoting human rights in the north" under the puppet unification ministry.
					
					 In the meantime, they are building up public opinion to give impression that the DPRK is to blame for the stalemate in the humanitarian cooperation between the north and the south while talking about "humanitarianism" and "solution to the issue of divided families".
					
					 This is a trite method employed by the group of traitors more dead than alive to get rid of the abyss of ruin they are finding themselves in due to the worst crisis of impeachment. It only reveals their sordid intention to cover up their hideous crimes under the signboard of "human rights" and stay in power by standing in confrontation with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 In fact, the south Korean puppet conservative regime has neither qualifications nor face to talk about human rights and humanitarianism of someone.
					
					 It is none other than the Park Geun Hye group who has turned south Korea into a tundra of human rights and the darkest society in the world where even elementary political freedom and rights are ruthlessly suppressed and toiling masses are treated as mere animals.
					
					 That's why the international community calls south Korea "the most horrible barren land of human rights on the planet." 
					
					 It was again the Park Geun Hye group of traitors who totally blocked exchange, cooperation and humanitarian work between the north and the south.
					
					 Their allurement and abduction of a group of DPRK citizens, in particular, are a thrice-cursed crime against the nation and humanity.
					
					 In April last the group of cruel hooligans abducted 12 women citizens of the DPRK to south Korea where they have forced them into "defection" for nearly a year.
					
					 Due to such organized and planned abduction committed by the puppet group in a bid to tarnish the dignity and prestige of the DPRK and undermine it, the number of "divided families" is on the steady increase in peace time.
					
					 The group of traitors, international terrorists and human rights abusers, are inflicting pain of forced separation between kinsmen while keeping citizens of a sovereign state in detention after kidnapping them in broad daylight in disregard of human ethics and international law. Yet, they trumpet about "human rights" and "humanitarianism". This is an insult and mockery of the world conscience and the entire Korean nation hoping for human rights and justice.
					
					 It is ridiculous and the height of shamelessness for the group of traitors to vociferate about "human rights".
					
					 They are obliged to officially acknowledge their sordid group abduction of DPRK women and "defection operation", apologize for them and let them reunite with their parents who are very anxious to know about the fate of their daughters.
					
					 And they should not keep in custody under absurd pretext a DPRK citizen Kim Ryon Hui who had been taken to south Korea after being cheated by agents of the puppet Intelligence Service in 2011 but let her return to the north according to her will.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Protest U.S. Moves to Deploy Stealth Destroyer
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Protest U.S. Moves to Deploy Stealth Destroyer
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Kangjong Village Council, the All-Islanders Measure Committee for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base and Building Peaceful Island and the Measure Council for Checking the Building of Jeju Naval Base in south Korea held a press conference on Feb. 7 in protest against the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' moves for the destroyer deployment outside the main gate of the Jeju naval base, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 At the press conference, the speakers said that if the destroyer is deployed in the Jeju naval base as intended by the U.S., it is clear that it will be used as its outpost for invading Asia. 
					
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately withdraw the assertions about the deployment of the destroyer and the south Korean authorities to flatly turn down the demand of the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Figures Call for Putting End to Puppet Group's Campaign against "Followers of North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Figures Call for Putting End to Puppet Group's Campaign against "Followers of North"
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- South Korean figures from all walks of life including the chief of the Kwangju Headquarters of the Confederation of Trade Unions and the chief of the Kwangju branch of the Teachers Union, the chief of the Kwangju Headquarters of the Government Employees' Trade Union and member of the former Unified Progressive Party held a press conference on Feb. 6 outside the former South Jolla Provincial Office at which they declared the action to oust Park Geun Hye, punish her followers and combat evils, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 They said that Park Geun Hye has propped up her regime by branding the political dissident forces as the "group to be eliminated in the society", persecuting them socially, economically and politically and binding them hands and feet.
					
					 They stressed the need to reinstate those who fell victim to the Park regime and suffered under it and punish the criminals.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Authorities for Introducing System of Paying Salaries according to Piece Rate
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Puppet Authorities for Introducing System of Paying Salaries according to Piece Rate
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The  Civic and Public Joint Action for Strengthening Public Nature and Checking System of Paying Salaries according to Piece Rate held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 3 denouncing the puppet authorities for introducing the system of paying salaries according to piece rate.
					 At the press conference, the speakers accused the puppet Ministry of Planning and Finance of forcibly introducing the system of paying salaries according to piece rate.
					
					 They will not remain an onlooker to the regime's said-above action, they said.

articles.title: Punishment of Chieftains in Cooking up Blacklist Demanded by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Punishment of Chieftains in Cooking up Blacklist Demanded by S. Korean Body
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- The Moviemen's Action to Cope with Blacklist of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 7 in demand of the punishment, detention and investigation of the chieftains who worked out the blacklist of men of culture and art, according to the south Korean online paper Voice of People.
					 The organization said the fabrication of the blacklist was the big crime of depriving people of their rights, freedom and democracy, an expression of the authorities' oppression of individuals. 
					
					 The organization demanded resignation of those responsible and their detention, investigation and punishment.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Venezuela
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Venezuela
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A Venezuelan national preparatory committee was formed in Caracas on Jan. 31 to celebrate the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Omar Lopez, chairman of the Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected as honorary chairman of the committee and Felix Jesus Velasquez Castillo, general coordinator of the Federal Secretariat of the United Left Party, as its chairman.
					
					 The committee consists of representatives of 10-odd political parties and social organizations of Venezuela.
					
					 It discussed the matters of organizing colorful political and cultural events on a nationwide scale to give wide publicity to the revolutionary careers and feats of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Belgium
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Belgium
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A Belgian preparatory committee was formed in Brussels on Jan. 28 to celebrate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairman and the secretary general of the Belgium-Korea Friendship Association were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Communist Party "Russian Communists" on Jan. 31.
					 M. A. Suraikin, chairman of the Party Central Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
Pyongyang, February 9 (KCNA) -- "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious", a work of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, was brought out in booklet by the Alwa & Deil Publishing House of Austria to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the seven decades-long history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a history of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also stresses that the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will be invincible.

articles.title: Efectuada entrevista de prensa en embajada rusa en Corea
articles.content:
Efectuada entrevista de prensa en embajada rusa en Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Diplomaticos de Rusia, la embajada rusa en Corea concedio este viernes una rueda de prensa.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los reporteros del dominio de prensa e informacion, el corresponsal de la TASS y los integrantes de la sede diplomatica rusa.
					
					El embajador ruso Alexandr Matsegora hizo uso de la palabra.
					
					El orador explico la historia del Dia de Diplomaticos de Rusia y senalo que los diplomaticos rusos actuan en muchos paises con entusiasmo y el patriotismo ardiente.
					
					Acto seguido, el respondio a las preguntas.
					
					Los participantes presenciaron las fotos y el video que presentan las actividades de diplomaticos rusos.

articles.title: Portavoz de direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi demanda anular "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de direccion nortena de Jonminthukwi demanda anular "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la direccion nortena del Comite Pannacional de Averiguacion Especial para Esclarecer Verdaderos Aspectos de Crimenes de Tropas Norteamericanas (Jonminthukwi) publico el dia 9 una declaracion en relacion con que se cumplen 50 anos desde la entrada en vigor del "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sur de Corea-EE.UU., concertado durante el mandato del dictador de Yusin (renovacion) Park Chung Hee.
					Pese al unanime rechazo de los habitantes surcoreanos la camarilla militar fascista de Park Chung Hee cometio el 9 de febrero de 1967 el acto vendepatria proyanqui de poner oficialmente en vigor el "acuerdo" mencionado pactado en julio de 1966 con EE.UU., denuncia la nota y prosigue:
					
					El "acuerdo" es el convenio vendepatria sin precedentes en la historia y el bandidesco y leonino documento esclavista de version moderna.
					
					En virtud del mismo, las tropas agresoras yanquis pudieron portarse como dominantes todopoderosos del suelo surcoreano ejerciendo prerrogativas ilimitadas e imponiendo indecibles sufrimientos, desgracias y afrentas a la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					No obstante, la horda traidora surcoreana trata de entregar enormes fondos, recaudados al pueblo por concepto de impuestos, a las tropas yanquis ocupantes suplicandoles la ocupacion perpetua del suelo surcoreano y terminar dentro de este ano el emplazamiento de THAAD de caracter agresivo. 
					
					Como si fuera poco el "Acuerdo Administrativo" Sudcorea-EE.UU., este obliga ahora a los titeres surcoreanos a suscribir con 9 paises pertenecientes a la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU" el "acuerdo multilateral sobre la posicion de las tropas estacionadas".
					
					Si se adopta ese ultimo, nueva version del "Acuerdo Administrativo", la poblacion surcoreana vivira bajo las botas de las tropas multinacionales y todo el suelo surcoreano se convertira en el antro mundial de criminales y saqueadores.
					
					EE.UU., causa raigal de de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos de los habitantes surcoreanos, es el enemigo jurado de nuestra nacion que quiere convertir el Sur de Corea en el maximo arsenal nuclear donde las tropas norteamericanas y las otras multinacionales actuen como duenas cometiendo crimenes internacionales.
					
					Mientras continuen la dominacion y ocupacion del Sur de Corea por EE.UU. y existan los titeres proyanquis, que viven dependiendo de las fuerzas extranjeras sin hacer caso a la dignidad, el interes, la existencia y la seguridad de la nacion, se agrandaran mas las desgracias y penas que sufren hoy dia los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Los surcoreanos de diferentes sectores deberan levantarse con valentia en la lucha por cancelar de inmediato todos los acuerdos y tratados desiguales, incluso el "Acuerdo Administrativo", expulsar del territorio surcoreano a las tropas agresoras de EE.UU. y eliminar a los vedepatrias proyanquis.

articles.title: ACNC comenta campana de DDHH anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
ACNC comenta campana de DDHH anti-RPDC de los titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Desde el principio del Ano Nuevo, la banda titere surcoreana recrudece su campana conflictiva con la RPDC usando como carta el "problema de DDHH".
					Hablando de la "gravedad de la situacion de DDHH del Norte (de Corea)", inicio la "investigacion" sobre el particular, debatio el rumbo del "fomento de DDHH del Norte" y establecio el "comite consultivo para el fomento de DDHH del Norte" adscrito al Ministerio de Unificacion.
					
					Al abogar con hipocresia por el "humanitarismo" y la "solucion del problema de familiares separados", induce en error la opinion publica hablando como si la RPDC fuera la culpable del cese de la cooperacion humanitaria entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Asi estan usando su rutinario metodo esos cadaveres politicos para salir de la peor crisis de dimision.
					
					Ellos abrigan la siniestra intencion de ocultar sus tremendos crimenes bajo el cartel de "DDHH" y mantener el poder enfrentandose hasta el final con la RPDC.
					
					En realidad, ningun tipejo del poder conservador surcoreano tiene la calidad ni cara para hablar de los derechos humanos y el humanitarismo.
					
					?Quien es el culpable que transformo el suelo surcoreano en el infierno de DDHH y la sociedad mas oscura del mundo donde se violan y se exterminan la elemental libertad y derechos politicos y los habitantes trabajadores son tratados como animales?
					
					El Sur de Corea es calificado por la sociedad internacional como "zona donde se violan de la peor manera los DDHH".
					
					La camarilla de Park Geun-hye suspendio totalmente el intercambio, la cooperacion y los trabajos humanitarios entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					En particular, el secuestro colectivo de las ciudadanas de la RPDC deviene el imperdonable crimen antinacional y antietico.
					
					En abril del ano pasado, los gangsteres surcoreanos raptaron y secuestraron a plena luz del dia a 12 muchachas norcoreanas y las retienen todavia en el Sur de Corea obligandoles la "sumision".
					
					En el actual periodo de paz, aparecen continuamente los "familiares separados" artificialmente debido al rapto organizado y planificado por la banda surcoreana con el proposito de manchar la dignidad y el prestigio de la RPDC y derrumbarla por dentro.
					
					Los traidores surcoreanos con terroristas internacionales y criminales de DDHH que se burlan de la conciencia de todo el mundo y de la nacion coreana, amantes de DDHH y justicia, hablando como si fueran defensores de DDHH y humanitarismo.
					
					Ellos deben reconocer y pedir disculpas oficialmente por el secuestro colectivo y la "operacion de sumision" contra nuestras ciudadanas y devolverlas sin demora a sus padres que las esperan con ansia.
					
					Ademas, deberan devolver de inmediato a nuestra ciudadana Kim Ryon Hui, que fue llevada en 2011 al Sur de Corea siendo enganada por el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea y exige fuertemente ahora su repatriacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun urge a autoridades surcoreanas mejorar relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun urge a autoridades surcoreanas mejorar relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur y abrir un ancho camino para la reunificacion independiente con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion en virtud de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa comun de la nacion por la reunificacion, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, es la posicion invariable de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					No se puede dilatar mas el cumplimiento de esa tarea historica nacional.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y prosigue:
					
					Quien este preocupado por el destino de la nacion, no puede hacer caso omiso de los actuales vinculos entre ambas partes coreanas que entranan hasta el peligro de guerra nuclear anti- Norte.
					
					Si se mejoran las relaciones N-S, se abriran grandes posibilidades de prevenir el peligro de guerra nuclear y lograr la reunificacion independiente.
					
					Pero, ahora las autoridades surcoreanas agravan aun mas la situacion lanzando de continuo la campana conflictiva con la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas, en vez de aceptar la buena voluntad y magnanimidad de la parte connacional.
					
					Si insisten como antes en el enfrentamiento dudando sin motivos justos a la RPDC que extiende la mano de reconciliacion y unidad, no se sanearan nunca las relaciones N-S.
					
					Deben comprender el profundo sentido del llamamiento de la RPDC y reflexionar con seriedad de las consecuencias que emanen de su negativa.
					
					Si ellas aspiran a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la mejora de relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur cambiando la anacronica politica conflictiva, se abrira la fase trascendental de paz y reunificacion.
					
					Antes de que se haga tarde, deberan hacer algo para rehabilitar los lazos N-S actualmente en la fase de ruptura y lograr la paz y reunificacion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia discriminacion contra escuelas coreanas en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia discriminacion contra escuelas coreanas en Japon
Pyongyang, 9 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el tribunal local de Osaka de Japon denego la justa demanda de la Escuela Coreana de Osaka formulada en cuanto a la decision injusta de las autoridades de la prefectura y la ciudad de Osaka de suspender unicamente a aquella el pago de fondos para la educacion entre las escuelas de extranjeros.
					Este veredicto es una muestra coherente de la politica chovinista tipica de Japon y la continuacion de su prolongada politica hostil a la RPDC.
					
					Asi revela el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 9 y prosigue:
					
					Esa accion discriminatoria, encaminada a suprimir el derecho a la educacion nacional de los coreanos en Japon, la pueden cometer solo los tipejos colmados del sentimiento anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses quieren separar a los coreanos residentes en Japon del regazo de la RPDC y de la Chongryon al imponerles la pesada carga financiera y la presion psicologica.
					
					Tanto en vista de los crimenes cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses como desde el punto de vista pedagogico, a las autoridades japonesas les incumbe el deber legal y moral de respetar y asegurar el derecho a la educacion nacional de los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					Las autoridades japonesas deben tratar seria e imparcialmente el tema de subsidio a las escuelas coreanas en su pais.
